scripts.dev: env-cmd -r shopify.presets.json -e development shopify theme dev
scripts.pull: env-cmd -r shopify.presets.json -e development shopify theme pull
scripts.pull:production: env-cmd -r shopify.presets.json -e production shopify theme pull
scripts.push: env-cmd -r shopify.presets.json -e development shopify theme push
scripts.push:production: env-cmd -r shopify.presets.json -e production shopify theme push
